channel.title: Possible?
channel.description:
Is there any way I can make a command for non mods only 1 time? For example the :: pimp1 command
If I could make Non-mods use it but only ONCE can mods and admins still use it? If yes tell me how please! Cause my peeps keep abusing the commands.!
